global_caption: a scene featuring an old person wearing a gray cardigan with 2 buttons on the shirt, black pants, and a beret, with short white hair, looking at a 35-year-old woman with medium-length wavy white hair wearing a beret, who is chubby and dressed in a short sleeve dress with a pink and blue flower pattern, and a 35-year-old male wearing a short-sleeved blue polo shirt, knee-length beige shorts, and black slippers. Nearby, there is a 7-year-old girl with short hair wearing a neon pink sleeveless top, a white puffy skirt, and pink sneakers, holding a yellow balloon with a white string in her left hand and a teddy bear in her right hand. Additionally, a tray full of disposable bottles of water is held in the male's left hand, and a basket with a few items in it is held by both the woman and the man.
region_captions: an old person wearing a gray cardigan with 2 buttons on the shirt, black pants, and a beret, with short white hair, around 150 cm tall, looking at the woman and the man, and slightly overweight
